sentence: In early trading on Wednesday, shares of Merck & Co ( MRK ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 5.1%.
Year to date, Merck & Co registers a 6.9% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is United Technologies ( UTX ), trading down 0.4%.
United Technologies is showing a gain of 1.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Home Depot ( HD ), trading down 0.3%, and Exxon Mobil Corp ( XOM ), trading up 0.8% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
